author: Patrick Van Cauteren

changelog.release_notes:
Slice your time with TimeSlicer.

Whether you are working or working out, it's important to keep focus and to have regular breaks.  TimeSlicer warns you when it's time to have a break, and time to start working (out) again.

After the configured time (by default 25 minutes) your Pebble will vibrate, telling you it's time to have a break.  Stay focused until your Pebble vibrates.  No more looking at your watch again.

When resting time is over (by default 5 minutes) your Pebble will vibrate again.  Back to work.

Working time and resting time can be configured up to 99 minutes.  Use SELECT button to configure the times.

Use the UP button to temporarily pause the time.
Use the DOWN button to quickly switch to a new work or rest period.
